column1: A few showers will occur in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Galle and Matara
Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Central, Uva and Eastern provinces
and in Mullaitivu and Vavuniya districts during the evening or night.
Mainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere over the Island.
General  public  is  kindly  requested  to  take  adequate  precautions  to  minimize  damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
